== How to mount Nexus 4 in Ubuntu ==

/draft/

1. Go "Settings" -> "Storage" -> Upper right corner button -> "USB computer connection" -> Check "Media device (MTP)".

2. Connect phone to computer by USB cable.

(works on Nexus 4 with Android 4.4.4, Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit)
